text.quote: 000: Clause 7, page 7, line 15, leave out “adult” and insert “individual”
000: Clause 7, page 7, line 16, after “carer,” insert “a carer of a child or a young carer,”
000: Clause 7, page 7, line 22, leave out “adult” and insert “individual”
000: Clause 7, page 7, line 23, after “carer,” insert “a carer of a child or a young carer,”
000: Clause 7, page 7, line 30, at end insert—
“( ) “Carer of a child” means a person who is a carer for the purposes of section 57.
“( ) “Young carer” has the same meaning as in section 60.”
